answers.answer: I think you could wait.  The date of your ovulation might be off by a week or so, in which case there is still hope.  Go back for a scan in 2 weeks.

question: well am 18 and i have diabetes so i have a high risk pregnancy and they say i have 8 to 9 weeks i went o the hospital and the told me that they dont see a heart beat or the fetus but the see the egg sac so most liky am havin a miscarriage so they gave me two chocies wait till i have the miscarriage at home or go back and have the pregnancy tissu takin out but i lil pain no cramps and no bleed i dont know to do should i wait or take the pregnancy tissu and she could be wrong am scare i dont want to lose my baby
title: give me a lil hope
